identity.title: Reporting the Total Hours Each Employee Worked

content.prompt:
Suppose we have an input file that contains information about how many hours each employee of a company has worked. The file looks like the following (Employee's identification number, Employee's name, Hours):
101 Erica 7.5 8.5 10.25 8 8.5
783 Erin 10.5 11.5 12 11 10.75
114 Simone 8 8 8
...
Construct a program that reads this file and calculates the total number of hours worked by each individual. Make sure that the program handles each specific exception that could occur.
